benchmark_details.name: Swedish Chatbot Arena
benchmark_details.overview: This study introduces a comprehensive human benchmark to assess the efficacy of prominent LLMs in understanding and generating Swedish language texts using forced choice ranking.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to improve access to high quality language models in Swedish.

data.source: The Swedish Chatbot Arena benchmark relies on forced binary ranking of two models to create a benchmark of model performance using ELO ratings.

methodology.calculation: ELO ratings are calculated based on preferences during forced binary ranking.
methodology.interpretation: Models are evaluated based on human preferences to determine which model performs better.
